name: NeedForVentilator
title: Need for Ventilator
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes related to procedures which indicate a need for a ventilator.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had an procedure demonstrating a need for a ventilator. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes representing an procedure showing a need for a ventilator  using the SNOMED and ICD 10 PCS code system.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria should be excluded.)

contains.display: Mechanically assisted spontaneous ventilation (regime/therapy)
Airway pressure release ventilation (regime/therapy)
Assist control ventilation (regime/therapy)
High frequency positive pressure ventilation (regime/therapy)
High frequency oscillatory ventilation (regime/therapy)
Intermittent negative pressure ventilation (regime/therapy)
Weaning from mechanically assisted ventilation (regime/therapy)
Artificial ventilation (regime/therapy)
Ventilator care assessment (procedure)
Ventilator care management (procedure)
